title: Complete Project Documentation
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the Java Todo List application including setup instructions, user guide, and technical documentation.

title: Code Review and Refactoring
description: Review the codebase for potential improvements, refactor complex methods, and ensure adherence to coding standards.

title: Database Schema Optimization
description: Optimize database queries, add proper indexing, and implement database connection pooling for better performance.

title: User Interface Enhancements
description: Improve the JavaFX user interface with better styling, icons, and user experience enhancements.

title: Unit Test Coverage
description: Increase unit test coverage to at least 80% and add integration tests for database operations.

title: Performance Benchmarking
description: Conduct performance testing with large datasets and identify bottlenecks in the application.

title: Security Audit
description: Perform security audit of the application, check for SQL injection vulnerabilities, and implement input validation.

title: Setup Continuous Integration
description: Configure CI/CD pipeline with automated testing, code quality checks, and deployment automation.

title: Backup and Recovery System
description: Implement automated backup system for task data and create disaster recovery procedures.

title: User Manual Creation
description: Create detailed user manual with screenshots and step-by-step instructions for end users.
